downloadTitle: Developing ISV Applications using Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0
downloadDescription: How to create business applications for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0.
detailsSection: Microsoft Dynamics CRM supports a wide range of business applications with the essentials required for building, delivering, and maintaining these applications in a multi-tenant SaaS environment. In this white paper we explore how, with Microsoft Dynamics CRM, an ISV can quickly build, deploy, and manage line-of-business applications.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
